name: Finding You Before Spring Coming
description:
Finding You Before Spring Coming is role play game about winter and leave home with a turn-based battle system. You embody a junior youth male sentry from a village, serve the characters in the story, fight in suburbs and wish to find you lover back.

At present, it supports English and Chinese, and may add support in other languages and dialogue dubbing in later.

Features

Witness A fancy winter


In the game world time, you will stride over a winter to spring. This is a short work; who you play is a easily depressed but accommodating character, called Holder.

It takes about 2 hours to end the entire game.

Succinct first person turn-based battle


Don't belittle your enemies who have only four types of attacks(ordinary attack, brave attack, outstanding attack, powerful attack); it's not easy to defeat them. You can use the controller, keyboard or mouse very casually to complete the battle in the game; we are back to the era of early role-playing games.

Imagine characters and relationships


In the course of the game, you have your own family members, friends, strangers and wild monsters. Some of them will give you instructions or ask you to help them, or no hints there. You need to understand the plot or the actual situation and implement the relevant requirements.

You may receive some gifts or special props in the game, which shows admiration to you.

Lifetime on two countries


There are only three scene in the game where you may encounter enemies. Simultaneously, in the scene with switches, you should study how to open the door in the scene by the switches.

The game can be divided into two parts, the first part is in one country, the second part is in another country and the end. In the first country, your identity is a local, while in the second country, your identity is a foreign tourist. You may encounter enemies in both countries.

A lively and warmth and possibly fighting world


The characters in the game may be talking to each other enthusiastically, or they may talk to you. You may be chased in situations where fighting may occur.

A Happy Ending


Guess where Holder will meet the one he is looking for?

Good luck!
